latest.comments:
New features:

 - You no longer have to download new version after a Hearthstone Patch release
 - Power log paths can now be configured
 - Fixed game start detection
latest.logchange:
New features:

 - You no longer have to download new version after a Hearthstone Patch release
 - Power log paths can now be configured
 - Fixed game start detection

1.5.1.comments:
New features:

 - Fixed UserNotFound after opponent Conceding
1.5.1.logchange:
New features:

 - Fixed UserNotFound after opponent Conceding

1.5.0.comments:
New features:

 - Fixed sudden UserNotFound error
 - Update log parsing for 6.2.0
1.5.0.logchange:
New features:

 - Fixed sudden UserNotFound error
 - Update log parsing for 6.2.0

1.4.0.comments:
New features:

 - Notifications are now disabled in spectator mode
 - Fixed random user not found error when opponents concede
 - New Winner event added to menu
 - Added support for alt accounts
1.4.0.logchange:
New features:

 - Notifications are now disabled in spectator mode
 - Fixed random user not found error when opponents concede
 - New Winner event added to menu
 - Added support for alt accounts

1.3.2.comments: New version supports Whispers of Old Gods Patch. Casualstone will also let you know when a new version is available from now on.
1.3.2.logchange: New version supports Whispers of Old Gods Patch. Casualstone will also let you know when a new version is available from now on.
